short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open IDE from Github PR via click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open IDEs directly from Github Pull Requests.

This extension improves the quality of life when dealing with Github pull requests. When enabled, this extension adds a wand icon next to the name of the file being commented on that, when clicked, will follow a "canopenr://" deeplink. With the aid of a downloaded app, that deeplink will then run a command of your choice to open a code editor on your machine to the commented file & line of code. This app can be downloaded at the Github link below.

Source code can be found here at https://github.com/radixdev/can-opener.
